lead_paragraph: Wendy Doniger, an American academic, sees in the book nothing short of anthropology, a rare portrait of an affluent ancient society.

headline.main: The Kama Sutra as a Work of Philosophy
headline.print_headline: The Kama Sutra as a Work of Philosophy

snippet: Wendy Doniger, an American academic, sees in the book nothing short of anthropology, a rare portrait of an affluent ancient society.
